insert into rdrecord09 (id, b_rd_flag,c_vouch_type,c_bus_type, c_source, c_wh_code, d_date, c_code, c_rd_code , c_dep_code, c_pt_code, c_ven_code, c_order_code, c_arv_code, c_handler, c_memo, b_trans_flag, c_maker, c_define1, c_define2, d_veri_date, d_arv_date, vt_id, c_modify_person, d_modify_date, d_make_time, d_modify_time, d_verify_time, c_pzid, c_sysbar_code, c_check_sign_flag) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.brdflag}, #{item.cvouchtype}, #{item.cbustype} , #{item.csource}, #{item.cwhcode}, #{item.ddate}, #{item.ccode}, #{item.crdcode}, #{item.cdepcode}, #{item.cptcode}, #{item.cvencode}, #{item.cordercode}, #{item.carvcode}, #{item.chandler}, #{item.cmemo}, #{item.btransflag}, #{item.cmaker}, #{item.cdefine1}, #{item.cdefine2}, #{item.dveridate}, #{item.darvdate}, #{item.vtid}, #{item.cmodifyperson}, #{item.dmodifydate}, #{item.dnmaketime}, #{item.dnmodifytime}, #{item.dnverifytime}, #{item.cpzid}, #{item.csysbarcode}, #{item.cchecksignflag} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = values(id), b_rd_flag = values(b_rd_flag), c_vouch_type = values(c_vouch_type), c_bus_type = values(c_bus_type), c_source = values(c_source), c_wh_code = values(c_wh_code), d_date = values(d_date), c_code = values(c_code), c_rd_code = values(c_rd_code) , c_dep_code = values(c_dep_code), c_pt_code = values(c_pt_code), c_ven_code = values(c_ven_code), c_order_code = values(c_order_code), c_arv_code = values(c_arv_code), c_handler = values(c_handler), c_memo = values(c_memo), b_trans_flag = values(b_trans_flag), c_maker = values(c_maker), c_define1 = values(c_define1), c_define2 = values(c_define2), d_veri_date = values(d_veri_date), d_arv_date = values(d_arv_date), vt_id = values(vt_id), c_modify_person = values(c_modify_person), d_modify_date = values(d_modify_date), d_make_time = values(d_make_time), d_modify_time = values(d_modify_time), d_verify_time = values(d_verify_time), c_pzid = values(c_pzid), c_sysbar_code = values(c_sysbar_code), c_check_sign_flag = values(c_check_sign_flag)
